title: How we kept the Google Play & Android app ecosystems safe in 2024
summary:
Posted by Bethel Otuteye and Khawaja Shams (Android Security and Privacy Team), and Ron Aquino (Play Trust and Safety)

Android and Google Play comprise a vibrant ecosystem with billions of users around the globe and millions of helpful apps.

title: How we estimate the risk from prompt injection attacks on AI systems
summary: Posted by the Agentic AI Security Team at Google DeepMindModern AI systems, like Gemini, are more capable than ever, helping retrieve data and perform actions on behalf of users.

title: PrintNightmare Aftermath: Windows Print Spooler Is Better. What's Next?
summary: While Microsoft has boosted the security of Windows Print Spooler in the three years since the disclosure of the PrintNightmare vulnerability, the service remains a spooky threat that organizations cannot afford to ignore.

title: Wiz Research Uncovers Exposed DeepSeek Database Leaking Sensitive Information, Including Chat History
summary: A publicly accessible database belonging to DeepSeek allowed full control over database operations, including the ability to access internal data.
